title: D-1 Devastator
synopsis: To follow in his missing friend Masato's footsteps, Ryo joined the vehicle company Yaesu. Ryo became involved with the Makuhari test course that Masato was also a part of. The leader, Gray Gear, told Ryo, "If you want to know about Masato, come to the test course late at night and ride the new machine."
staff: [['Nishimura, Junji', ['Director']], ['Sogo, Masashi', ['Script']], ['Oobari, Masami', ['Animation Director', ' Mechanical Design']], ['Miyamae, Mitsuharu', ['Art Director']]]
